types.section:
{{fr-verb}}

# to [[change]] [[subject]]s [[abruptly]], to go [[from pillar to post]], to [[hop]] from one subject to another, to [[jump]] from [[topic]] to [[topic]], to constantly [[go off on a tangent]]
types.html:
passer du coq à l'âne

  1. to change subjects abruptly, to go from pillar to post, to hop from one subject to another, to jump from topic to topic, to constantly go off on a tangent
trans: to change subjects abruptly, to go from pillar to post, to hop from one subject to another, to jump from topic to topic, to constantly go off on a tangent

title: passer du coq à l'âne
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pa.se dy kɔk a l‿an/ ~ /pɑ.se dy kɔk a l‿ɑn/
